markdownRemark.html: For anyone who has been following me, you have seen the series I was doing on Naval Ravikants tweetstorm on how to create wealth. I got up to his post on how the internet has enabled people to scale their niche obsession and reach thousands of people with similar interests and it got me thinking on how I can better leverage what I am doing with my website. One topic that has been very interesting to me lately has been strategy and how people can use it in their life and careers.

frontmatter.title: Strategy Project
frontmatter.description: After flitting from topic to topic without any discernible direction, I have decided to focus my writing on strategy and strategic thinking/planning. It is a topic that has been important in my career and I think more people would benefit from learning about it.

frontmatter.title: Give Society What It Doesn't Know How To Get -- My Thoughts
